import { SectionCloseImage } from "/src/components/Images";


# Section Message
Toggles allow user to turn an option on or off.

<div style={{backgroundColor: 'white', borderRadius: 16, padding: 32, marginBottom: 24}}>
   <SectionCloseImage />
</div>

```xml
<com.waresix.lib.ui.component.molecule.SectionMessageAV
    android:id="@+id/sm1"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    android:text="This is example section info general"
    app:sectionMessageVariant="general" />

<com.waresix.lib.ui.component.molecule.SectionMessageAV
    android:id="@+id/sm2"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    android:text="This is example section info error or danger"
    app:sectionMessageVariant="error" />

<com.waresix.lib.ui.component.molecule.SectionMessageAV
    android:id="@+id/sm3"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    android:text="This is example section info warning"
    app:sectionMessageVariant="warning" />

<com.waresix.lib.ui.component.molecule.SectionMessageAV
    android:id="@+id/sm4"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    android:text="This is example section info positive"
    app:sectionMessageVariant="positive" />
```

to make the section message dismissable with close icon just add attribute `app:dismissable="true"`. e.g 
```xml
<com.waresix.lib.ui.component.molecule.SectionMessageAV
    android:id="@+id/sm4"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    android:text="This is example section info positive"
    app:dismissable="true"
    app:sectionMessageVariant="positive" />
```
